ca.utoronto.msrg.padres.tools.padresmonitor
Class BrokerUI 

java.lang.Object
  ca.utoronto.msrg.padres.tools.padresmonitor.BrokerUI

public class BrokerUI
				
extends Object

This class encapsulates all the properties of a BrokerUI element. This class has package level visibility because it should only ever be used in an OverlayUI subclass which must be in this package.

Constructor Detail

BrokerUI

public BrokerUI(String brokerID)
Construct a BrokerUI for the given broker ID. All other fields take on default values. This constructor is needed because we can get a broker ID as a neighbour of another broker before actually getting a broker info. message from that broker.

Parameters:
brokerID - ID of the broker.

BrokerUI

public BrokerUI(ConcurrentHashMap<String,Object> map)
Construct a BrokerUI from a Map object. The map object is typically the payload portion of a broker info. message.

Parameters:
map - Map of key-value pairs carrying properties of a broker.
Method Detail

addNeighbour

public boolean addNeighbour(String brokerID)
Add a broker to this BrokerUI's list of neighbors.

Parameters:
brokerID - ID of the new neighbour.
Returns:
true if the broker wasn't already neighbour and is now added.

removeNeighbour

public boolean removeNeighbour(String brokerID)
Remove a broker from this BrokerUI's neighbour list.

Parameters:
brokerID - ID of the ex-neighbour.
Returns:
true if the broker was a neighbour and is now removed.

isNeighbour

public boolean isNeighbour(String brokerID)
Determine if the specified broker is a neighbour of the broker represented by this BrokerUI.

Parameters:
brokerID - ID of the broker.
Returns:
true if the specified broker is a neighbour.

toString

public String toString()
Return a string representation of this broker. Because broker IDs are unique, simply return the broker ID (as a String).

Overrides:
toString in class Object
Returns:
The String representation of this BrokerUI.

equals

public boolean equals(Object o)
Checks if this BrokerUI is equal to the passed in object. This method can only return true if the passed object is an instance of BrokerUI, and only if the ID is the same as this broker's ID. Because broker IDs are unique in an overlay network we only have to check this field, all others are ignored.

Overrides:
equals in class Object
Parameters:
o - An Object.

hashCode

public int hashCode()
Return the hash code for this BrokerUI. The returned hash code is completely determined by the broker ID.

Overrides:
hashCode in class Object
Returns:
The hash code.
